mapper.select: select board_no, title, emp_no, bo_regdate, visit_cnt from BOARD order by board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (board_no,title, content, emp_no,bo_regdate, visit_cnt) values (board_board_no_seq.nextval, #{title} , #{content}, #{emp_no}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select board_no, title, emp_no, content from BOARD where board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.update: update BOARD set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, bo_regdate=sysdate where board_no=#{board_no}
update BOARD set visit_cnt=(select visit_cnt+1 from BOARD where board_no=#{board_no}) where board_no=#{board_no}
